name: sketch-hot-dog
description: What would you say if I told you there is a sketch plugin on the market that tell you if your sketch layer is a hotdog or not a hotdog. It is very good and I do not want to work on it any more. You can hire someone else.

scripts.download-datasets: (rm -rf datasets || true) && mkdir -p datasets/hotdog/ && mkdir -p datasets/not_hotdog/ && node scripts/download-images.js dataset-urls/not_hotdog4.txt datasets/not_hotdog/ && node scripts/download-images.js dataset-urls/not_hotdog3.txt datasets/not_hotdog/ && node scripts/download-images.js dataset-urls/not_hotdog2.txt datasets/not_hotdog/ && node scripts/download-images.js dataset-urls/not_hotdog1.txt datasets/not_hotdog/ && node scripts/download-images.js dataset-urls/hotdog1.txt datasets/hotdog/ && node scripts/download-images.js dataset-urls/hotdog2.txt datasets/hotdog/
scripts.prettify: find . -name "*.js" | grep -v node_modules | xargs npm run prettier:base

author: Mathieu Dutour <mathieu@dutour.me>
